Join a team that is changing millions of lives.

Transforming smiles, changing lives

At Align Technology, we believe a great smile can transform a person’s life, so we create technology that gives people the confidence to take on whatever’s next. Ready to join us?

As Clinical Protocol Specialist, your role is to develop and communicate the next generation of Invisalign treatment planning protocol with doctors and Align development teams. You will be responsible for taking doctors clinical preferences and treatment planning needs and converting that into clinical treatment planning protocol based on their general preferences or specific case types. 
As part of the treatment planning protocol development, you will also learn how to take clinical requirements and implement them into technical treatment planning language.  Your mission is to set up and drive the implementation of the Invisalign treatment planning protocol to support over 4000 doctors in the APAC region and the maintenance of these protocols as technical subject matter expert in developing treatment planning protocol.
This person will be part of the APAC core team focused on reimagining Invisalign digital treatment planning experience and will own to set-up and drive the regional implementation of treatment protocols. This is an individual contributor role and will report into APAC Business Transformation Lead.

Review and mine doctor’s clinical preferences and transmit them to the new Invisalign treatment planning protocol process.
Develop coding to develop treatment planning protocol via close communication and working relationship with country clinical protocol interviewer
Ensure doctor’s preferences are captured in Invisalign treatment planning protocol technically and clinically and monitor for regular updates.
Provide clinical and technical insights for R&D teams to ensure APAC doctor needs on protocol development is properly reflected.
Deliver on assigned protocol development volumes to meet APAC project milestones and targets
Develop strong working relationships and credibility with team leader, peers, and country teams.
Learn new software language to provide treatment planning protocol for APAC doctors
